Posts.EditableText:
Im not sure how to do this still... 
I have onject.progres =1 at the start but i want an action(a verb on an object in other room) to print a msg then increase the atribute by 1 each time

Do i need to set the atribute as something other then expression?
Posts.HTML:
Im not sure how to do this still...
I have onject.progres =1 at the start but i want an action(a verb on an object in other room) to print a msg then increase the atribute by 1 each time

Do i need to set the atribute as something other then expression?

Posts.EditableText:
You mean like:
```
onject.progres = onject.progres + 1
```

That sets the value of `onject.progres` to the result of the expression `onject.progres + 1`; taking the current value of `onject.progres` and adding 1 to it.
Posts.HTML:
You mean like:
